main.production

Class PolygonWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.production.PolygonWorker

extends java.lang.Object

    Bernd Grafe

      • useTypification

        public static java.util.List<com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Polygon> useTypification(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Polygon[] polygons,
                                                                                  com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Envelope env)
        Deprecated. 
        bigger gets bigger typification - sort polygons, biggest first - search surroundings for biggest polygons increase (buffer) and delete smaller ones
        Parameters:
        polygons -
        env - Extent
        Returns:
        list of strange typified polygons

      • useNearestNeighborTypification

        public static java.util.List<com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Polygon> useNearestNeighborTypification(com.vividsolutions.jts.index.strtree.STRtree tree,
                                                                                                 com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Envelope env,
                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer maxTyp,
                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer typmode,
                                                                                                 double weight)
        Typification based on nearest neighbor (str-tree) with or without orientation weighting / centre of gravity / area weight / clustering / max amount of objects
        Parameters:
        tree - STRtree with polygons
        env - Extent
        maxTyp - max elements to typify
        typmode - 0=create new tree after(recommended, especially with weighting) nN; 1=replace polygons in old str-tree
        weight - weight distance:orientation with 1:x for nearest neighbor
        Returns:
        list of typified polygons

      • simplifyBasedOnString

        public static java.lang.String simplifyBasedOnString(java.util.List<com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Polygon> poly,
                                                     java.lang.String jsonString,
                                                     double scale,
                                                     double speed,
                                                     java.lang.String name,
                                                     java.lang.String type)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Simplifies Polygons if transfer time is above 5 seconds recursevly
        Parameters:
        poly -
        jsonString - to check length for transfer
        scale - scale to calculate time
        speed - in kbps to calculate time
        name - of geoJSON to create new String
        type - of geoJSON to create new String
        Returns:
        GeoJSON STring
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
